about_the_game:
You can play this battle royale entirely with mouse & keyboard, or with a controller (the battles).


Is Z Zombies for YOU?

This game is designed to give great satisfaction as you hone your skills and improve your control over the battlefield. In addition, there are many abilities that are unlocked when you level up in the game, as well as unique abilities associated with the skin you use, can you master them all?
As in most games you will start with the basics, but in a short time you will be mixing skins to get the most out of them.

GAME FEATURES YES/BUT

YES

  • Humor and explosions of corpses.
  • Exploding sticky zombies.
  • Huge exploding sticky zombies.
  • 3 game modes: Campaign, infinite and 5v5.
  • 100+ skins with their unique and fun abilities.
  • 20+ upgrades on the battlefield.
  • Unlock a pair ally to help you in battle.
  • Upgrade your team.

BUT

  • NOT a button-mashing game.
  • NOT AAA graphics (Big heads).
  • Online Multiplayer (In the future).

Note from Developer

I have fully developed this game in just two years (sharing time with my main job that has nothing to do with it ^^), it's my first game on steam. The reason for creating it? I always wanted to play a game like this.
If you decide to purchase a copy, receive a big hello and thank you! I hope you enjoy it as much as I did developing it!

name: Z Zombies : Battle Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Quad-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of VRAM minimum, OpenGL 2.1 and GLSL 1.2 support (generally 2012 or newer)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated (2012 or newer)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated (2018 or newer)

short_description: A challenging battle royale that will test you and make you decide quickly and wisely! Shoot those pesky zombies and the other players in the arena as quickly and tactically as possible!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Arabic, Russian
*languages with full audio support
